John Robie.Action: Snips dead blooms off his rose bushes in a calm, gentle manner.
Makes some comment to his housekeeper while she dusts around.
Turns suspiciously toward the approaching car but then returns to his gardening and moves with calm purpose.
Has his housekeeper drive the car while he casually crosses the road and takes the bus home, allowing her to participate actively.

Looks calmly out the window at the passing police car, showing composure rather than suspicion or hostility.
Glances at the woman with a bird in a cage on her lap, observing the frightened fluttering calmly and deadpan, not reacting harshly.
When encountering a policeman, subtly disguises himself with an exaggerated yawn and a raised palm, demonstrating a playful, non-confrontational approach without aggression.
